links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
mathematica: f[n_] := Quotient[3^n, 10^Floor[n*Log[10, 3]]]; Table[ f@n, {n, 0, 104}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 09 2008 *)First[IntegerDigits[#]]&/@(3^Range[0,110]) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 16 2016 *)
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); for (n=0, 1000, t=log(3)/log(10); write("b060956.txt", n, " ", 3^n \ 10^floor(n*t)); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 15 2009]
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), May 08 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 11 2001
